page.title: 15What's on in Thurlow
page.content: Gardening is extremely popular pastime with men working on vegetable allotments long into the summer evenings. Thurlow and Carlton Green's gardens are a tribute to their owners' hard work, neat and tidy in the winter and cascading with colour in the summer. The village hall is used for wedding receptions on many Saturdays. Open disco evenings were tried but were given up because of disruption from outsiders, so now most village hall functions are organised by the various clubs. There is a strong reserve of talent here for organising annual events;the Thurlow Steam Rally attracting those beautiful engines of iron adn steam from a wide area. There is a September Fair and mini-fetes, concerts and bazaars.
